name: CHIBO ADVENTURE DEMO
description:
Hello, this is my first project and I like to share it with you.

The game is about a little robot called "chibo", who has to find his way out of a station on the moon. Surrounded by enemies and traps, he has to run, jump and solve puzzles to reach the end of a level.

In this demo you can explore my vision of a potential game:

  • in over 10 level
  • with an experimental control scheme
  • different types of traps and enemies
  • and also on mobile


    CONTROLS PC   

left arrow - change direction

right arrow - jump (press longer for a higher jump)

esc/return - pause menue

mouse - control all the menue stuff

   CONTROLS MOBILE   

left button - change direction

right button - jump (press longer for a higher jump)

pause button - pause menue

touch control - control all the menue stuff 

Hope you enjoy the game like I do making it. Have fun and thank you!
